response.job_title: Software engineer, blockchain, AWS, entrepreneurship and innovation.
response.summary: Fullstack JS Developer || AWS Certified Solutions Architect || Certified Scrum Master || English C1 || MsC Student.
response.skills: Linux Administration, Administración de sistemas Linux, Clean Architecture, AWS, AWS Serverless, Jenkins, NestJS, Next.js, Blockchain, Ethereum, PostgreSQL, GitlabCI, Desarrollo de software, Scrum, Gestión de proyectos, Marketing, Git, JavaScript, Amazon Web Services, React.js

profile_positions.description:
I had the privilege of leading the planning and execution of the Wallet Connector project at Finoa, an innovative project that was developed following global standards in the blockchain industry. Our primary goal was to facilitate a smooth and secure interaction between dApps and Finoa.

Key Components of the Project:

User-Oriented WebApp:
We developed an intuitive and user-friendly web application, designed to offer an exceptional user experience, ensuring users could interact efficiently and securely with the connected dApps.

Wallet Connection Service:
We implemented a robust service to manage webapp requests, whitelisting functionalities, and SDK interaction mechanisms to ensure security and efficiency in every transaction.

SDK for dApp Interaction:
We created a customized SDK that enables dApps to effectively utilize our project, promoting innovation and the expansion of the blockchain ecosystem.

During my time at Finoa, I demonstrated effective leadership skills, teamwork, and a deep understanding of blockchain technology and its practical applications.
profile_positions.title: Fullstack Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
As a Principal Software Developer for a company in the financial/insurance sector, we planned and developed an internal platform that facilitates the storage and management of documents for the Latin America region.

The platform was developed using React.js with Typescript for the frontend and AWS Serverless Application Model with Typescript for the backend. Jenkins was utilized for CI/CD management.
profile_positions.title: Principal Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Fullstack development for external client of the financial / insurance field under Node.js and React.js. Using the AWS technologies: Lambda, Serverless, API Gateway, DynamoDB, among others. Using BitBucket for version control and Jenkins as continuous integration and delivery tools.

Project developed under Scrum agile methodology.
profile_positions.title: Fullstack developer

profile_positions.description:
Proposal presentation and development for new functionalities, working closely with managers from different areas. Close contact with clients, in this case different universities in the country, to get feedback and make decisions within the team.

All the work was developed under the Scrum framework for agile development.
profile_positions.title: Search team leader

profile_positions.description: Development of the search microservice for the platform mainly with Node.js, Typescript and PostgreSQL databases using AWS technologies such as Serverless, Lambda, API Gateway, Elastic Search, S3, RDS, Route 53, Cognito, IAM, Cloudwatch and VPC. Using Gitlab under GitFlow for code versioning. The main function of the microservice is to interpret and connect the user's search interests both with APIs from external publishers and with the documents and content hosted on the platform to improve the results and the experience within it.
profile_positions.title: Backend developer

profile_positions.description: Development of web pages for small companies under Node.js and React.js mainly. Use of different technologies such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, EJS, JSX and relevant libraries such as Express.js. Moment.js, D3.js, and TypeORM. Making use of both relational (PostgreSQL and MySQL) and non-relational (MongoDB) databases. Code versioning on GitHub under GitFlow.
profile_positions.title: Fullstack developer

company.name: Finoa
company.description:
Finoa GmbH is a regulated custodian for crypto assets, servicing professional investors with custody and staking. The company is licensed as a financial institution for crypto custody, investment brokerage, and proprietary trading of crypto.

The platform enables its users to securely store and manage their crypto assets, while providing a directly accessible, intuitive, and unique user experience, enabling seamless access to the ecosystem of Decentralized Finance (DeFi).

Finoa was founded in Berlin in 2018 and is a licensed financial institution under the German Banking Act (KWG), supervised by the Federal Financial Supervisory Authority – BaFin (Bundesanstalt für Finanzdienstleistungsaufsicht).

Reference customers include the world’s most renowned Venture Capital firms, large corporations, and financial institutions.

location.raw: Frankfurt an der Oder, Brandenburg, Germany
